verses.verse: «A Song of degrees of David.» Behold, how good and how pleasant [it is] for brethren to dwell Because the greatest part was against David, though some favoured him, yet when he was established king at length, they joined all together like brothers: and therefore he shows by these similarities the convenience of brotherly love. together in unity!

[It is] like the precious The ointment was a figure of the graces which come from Christ the head of his Church. ointment upon the head, that ran down upon the beard, [even] Aaron's beard: that went down to the skirts of his garments;

As the dew of By Hermon and Zion he means the plentiful country about Jerusalem. Hermon, [and as the dew] that descended upon the mountains of Zion: for Where there is such concord. there the LORD commanded the blessing, [even] life for evermore.
